content.p: We are sorry to inform you that due to unforeseen circumstances, this weekâ€™s Sparta Live! online talk has been cancelled. It will be rescheduled for spring. Thank you for your understanding. Neil Bar (Bar Ilan University) Xerxes and his Barbarian Horde Returns: The Battle of Thermopylae, Ephialtes, and the Cultivation of Xenophobia by the Greek Golden Dawn To be added to the mailing list for this event, please email chrysanthi.gallou@nottingham.ac.uk. The Microsoft Teams link to join this event will be added here soon. telephone: +44 (0)115 951 4800 fax: +44 (0)115 951 4811 email: csps@nottingham.ac.uk
